title: I Know Myself (Self-Confidence)
subtitle: My First Day of School
initialNarration: It's the first day of school, and you feel excited yet a bit nervous. You notice a girl wearing a name tag with the same color as yours. She seems friendly.
initialDialogue: Hi, my name is Annie. Nice to meet you!
npcResponse: Hello! I'm Annie. Nice to meet you. I'm glad you came over to say hi!
narrationPrompt: What should be the best response?

choices.text: Nice to meet you too, Annie! We have the same color name tag! What section are you in?
choices.response: Perfect! You showed great social skills by being friendly and asking a relevant question!
Good effort! You were polite, but try adding a question next time to keep the conversation going.
Remember, it's important to engage in conversation when someone introduces themselves.

lessonLearned: Approaching someone and introducing yourself is a great first step to making new friends. Just remember to show interest in the other person by asking questions and listening to what they have to say!
